org.alljoyn.bus

Class Translator

  • Object
    • Translator

  • public abstract class Translator
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Translator()
      Create native resources held by objects of this class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract String getTargetLanguage(int index)
      Retrieve one of the list of target languages this Translator supports
      abstract int numTargetLanguages()
      Get the number of target languages this Translator supports
      abstract String translate(String fromLanguage, String toLanguage, String fromText)
      Translate a string into another language

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Translator

        public Translator()
        Create native resources held by objects of this class.

    • Method Detail

      • numTargetLanguages

        public abstract int numTargetLanguages()
        Get the number of target languages this Translator supports
        Returns:
        numver of target languages

      • getTargetLanguage

        public abstract String getTargetLanguage(int index)
        Retrieve one of the list of target languages this Translator supports
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the requested target language within the list
        Returns:
        The requested target language or null if index is out of bounds

      • translate

        public abstract String translate(String fromLanguage,
               String toLanguage,
               String fromText)
        Translate a string into another language
        Parameters:
        fromLanguage - the language to translate from
        toLanguage - the language to translate to
        fromText - the text to be translated
        Returns:
        the translated text or null if it can not be translated
